project_abstract.cdata: The National Maize Project comprises: the provision of maize production inputs to approximately 950 participating villages; the strengthening of extension services through training and the provision of transport and extension aids; the improvement of the distribution of maize inputs and maize marketing through the provision of required transportation; the improvement of maize research; assistance for further project preparation; and the provision of related technical services.
